attributes.additional_details: I feel although it’s absolutely unacceptable for people to be told they have to wear a specific shirt blazer regardless
attributes.background: It is absolutely unacceptable for students to have to wear a specific uniform. I believe we should have the freedom to choose what we wear regardless weather in school or not

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
